PERSONA:
meet james, a 67-year-old married african american man living in a metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. with some college education under his belt, james is a devout protestant who attends religious services more than once a week. he is a born-again, evangelical christian and his faith plays a significant role in his life.

politically, james aligns himself with the democratic party and holds liberal ideological views. despite being in the middle-income bracket, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually, he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously.

james takes pride in his african american heritage and embraces his cultural roots. he was born and raised in the united states and has a strong sense of patriotism and citizenship. while he values his privacy and chose not to disclose his hispanic identification, his identity is deeply rooted in his african american background.

in his free time, james enjoys engaging in community activities and volunteering, though he preferred not to share details about his volunteerism status. he is an active member of his local church and finds solace in regular religious services and fellowship with fellow congregants.

overall, james is a principled and socially conscious individual who cherishes his family, faith, and cultural identity. he is a well-rounded person with a strong moral compass and a commitment to making a positive impact in his community.
